hero.title: Monitor Your Hardware
hero.description: A lightweight, open-source hardware monitoring tool built with Tauri. Track CPU, GPU, memory usage and more with minimal system impact.

features.title: Powerful Monitoring Features
features.subtitle: HardwareVisualizer provides comprehensive hardware monitoring with an intuitive interface and minimal system impact.

cpu.title: CPU Monitoring
cpu.description: Track CPU usage, temperature, and frequency in real-time with detailed per-core statistics.

memory.title: Memory Analysis
memory.description: Monitor RAM usage, available memory, and memory allocation across applications.

gpu.title: GPU Metrics
gpu.description: View GPU utilization, temperature, memory usage, and clock speeds for supported graphics cards.

performance.title: Performance Insights
performance.description: Analyze long-term hardware usage patterns with historical logs, trend visualization, and process usage statistics.

lightweight.title: Lightweight
lightweight.description: Built with Tauri for minimal resource usage, ensuring the monitor itself doesn't impact system performance.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: Fully transparent, community-driven development with the source code available on GitHub.

footer.description: A lightweight hardware monitor built with Tauri for real-time hardware status monitoring.
